title: The Chase contestant flirts with Mark Labbett as she calls The Beast 'bigger daddy'
text:

It all gets a bit steamy on Tuesday's episode of The Chase .

A contestant appeared to get hot under the collar as she subtly flirted with the Chaser Mark Labbett.

Contestant Deborah, who is a self-confessed secret wrestling super fan, cheekily flirted with The Beast, 53, as she introduced herself.

The quiz show hopeful got very flustered as she attempted to woo The Chaser and get in his good books.

She said: "You're my favourite."

After confessing Big Daddy was her favourite wrestler, Deborah told the audience of her wrestling hobby and her dedication to travelling across the globe to see WWE matches.

(Image: ITV)

Mark played along with Deborah's wrestling knowledge as he flirted back with the contestant.

He said: "Given your a fan of 'Big Daddy', I'm not suprised. Meet the tribute act - Bigger Daddy!"

Mark's appearance as The Chaser on tonight's episode of the quizzing show comes amid his recent reconciliation with his cheating wife and second cousin Kate.

(Image: ITV)

The Chase star announced he had split from his wife of five years Katie, 26, in May after it emerged that she had been seeing someone else for the past year.

During an appearance on Loose Women last month, Mark retreated.

He told the panel: "Like a lot of relationships, you go through a rough patch. We’re working our way through it.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: Tom Dymond/REX/Shutterstock)

"A newspaper offered us a sum of money and we kindly denied. We're quite private, there's no pictures of our son online and I'm not going to name him until he's old enough to make the decision.

Panelist Denise Welch asked whether they were still together and Mark flashed his wedding ring.

The couple, who have one son, decided to go their separate ways after images emerged showing Katie on a date with metal worker Scott in May.
description: A wrestling superfan looked flustered as she met The Chaser and cheekily told him "You're my favourite"
